member_organisations:
The sole Member of 'DKMS gemeinnützige GmbH' is 'DKMS Stiftung Leben Spenden' (Tübingen, Germany) 
 
'DKMS gemeinnützige GmbH' is the sole Member of the following organizations: 
- DKMS LIFE gemeinnützige GmbH (Tübingen, Germany) 
- DKMS Cord Blood Bank gGmbH (Dresden, Germany) 
- DKMS Life Science Lab GmbH (Dresden, Germany) 
- DKMS (New York, USA) 
- Fundacja DKMS (Warsaw, Poland) 
- DKMS Foundation (London, UK) 
 
(https://www.dkms.de/en/about-dkms)
fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
Tissue and Cells Directive (Directive 2004/23/EC) 
 
Blood and Blood Components Directive (Directive 2002/98/EC) 
 
General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679) 
 
E-Privacy (Regulation 2002/58/EC) 
 
Union Customs (Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2015/2446)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
DKMS is represented in the 'World Marrow Donor Association' (WMDA), a voluntary organisation of representatives of blood stem cell donor registries, cord blood banks, other organisations and individuals with an interest in blood stem cell Transplantation. 
 
(https://www.wmda.info/about-us) 
 
 
DKMS cooperates closely with the German National Bone Marrow Donor Registry (ZKRD) 
 
(https://www.zkrd.de/en/about_the_zkrd/the_zkrd.php)
goals__remit:
Our mission 
 
We recruit donors 
We recruit, retain and motivate stem cell donors globally to save patients’ lives. 
 
We provide access to treatment  
We are committed to providing all blood cancer patients with access to appropriate 
 
We help to improve blood cancer therapies  
We support all efforts to improve the outcome of blood stem cell transplantation. 
 
We care about patients  
We maximize patients’ well-being! 
 
 
What we do 
 
- We create awareness of blood cancer diseases and treatments.  
 
- We recruit stem cell donors for the chance of saving patients’ lives.  
 
- We engage the public as well as corporations to organize donor drives. 
 
- We raise funds to match registration costs and to expand our services to 
 better serve patients. 
 
- We help to improve blood cancer therapies – through our own research and State-of-the-art Technology in our lab.  
 
- We maintain our donor relationship from day one of registration until stem cell donation.  
 
- We care about patients – and provide information and services in helping to manage a life-threatening situation.
